title: "Melbourne's Arden Street Labs develops COVID-19 self-assessment platform for Austin Health"
excerpt: "Microsoft partner Arden Street Labs has built a community self-assessment platform for Melbourne-based training hospital Austin Health to help monitor COVID-19 symptoms. The Azure-hosted platform helps collect data from people arriving in the hospital to determine if they needed to come in or stay at home,"
